description:
My business ( http://spielend-programmieren.at) is to  teach programming  (python) to young children, i do this self-employed, outside schools since 2006. 
In this talk, i give my personal experience of what works (for, me, in regard of teaching children to code), what does not work, and how to best teach complex topics like free software / open source to children age 10+.
title: Teaching python to (your) children
